threat: With cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, if a user were tricked into viewing server output during a crafted server request, a remote attacker could exploit this to modify the contents, or steal confidential data (such as passwords), within the same domain.
A remote attacker could use this issue to cause the server to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.
A local attacker could possibly use this issue to gain privileges.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
